items.title: 苹果今天发布的所有产品一览 (原标题: Here's Everything Apple Announced Today)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
苹果今日通过一系列新闻稿而非传统的发布会，推出了多款更新产品，核心亮点是全新的M5芯片。这些更新涵盖了MacBook Pro、Vision Pro和iPad Pro。

### 今日发布的主要产品更新

1.  **MacBook Pro (M5)**
    *   **芯片：** 搭载M5芯片，配备10核CPU和10核GPU，并集成GPU神经网络加速器。
    *   **性能提升：** 内存带宽从120GB/s提升至153GB/s；SSD速度提升2倍，存储容量最高可达4TB。
    *   **价格：** 起售价为1,599美元。
    *   **注意：** 在欧洲地区，新款MacBook Pro的包装盒内不包含充电器。

2.  **Vision Pro (M5)**
    *   **芯片：** 搭载M5芯片，配备10核CPU和10核GPU。
    *   **显示与刷新率：** Micro-OLED显示屏的像素渲染量增加10%，带来更清晰的图像和更锐利的文字；刷新率最高可达120Hz，有效减少运动模糊。
    *   **电池与舒适度：** 电池续航时间延长至2.5小时；包含更舒适的Dual Knit Band（也可单独购买，价格为99美元）。
    *   **价格：** 起售价为3,499美元。
    *   **相关信息：** M2 Vision Pro已停产，不接受以旧换新；两款Vision Pro新配件已上市。

3.  **iPad Pro (M5)**
    *   **芯片：** 搭载M5芯片，最高配备10核CPU和10核GPU。
    *   **内存与存储：** 最低配备12GB RAM；SSD读写速度提升2倍。
    *   **网络连接：** 配备N1网络芯片，支持Wi-Fi 7和蓝牙6；C1X调制解调器使蜂窝数据性能提升高达50%。
    *   **充电：** 支持快速充电，35分钟内可充至50%。
    *   **价格：** 起售价为999美元。
    *   **相关信息：** 适用于iPad Air的妙控键盘推出了黑色版本。

### 上市信息

所有搭载M5芯片的新设备已于今日开始接受预订，并将于10月22日（周三）正式发售。

### 文章中提及的其他相关新闻与传闻

*   **Apple TV+品牌重塑：** Apple TV+将更名为“Apple TV”。
*   **iOS更新：** 苹果正在内部测试iOS 26.0.2，预计将是一个修复错误和/或安全漏洞的小型更新。
*   **未来产品传闻：**
    *   **AirPods Max 2：** 传闻将比现有型号更轻。
    *   **iPhone 18 Pro：** 传闻将有6项新功能，包括更小的灵动岛。
    *   **AirPods Pro/AirPods 5：** 苹果据报正在开发新一代AirPods Pro、AirPods 5以及H3芯片。
    *   **M5芯片预测：** 彭博社的Mark Gurman曾预测iPad Pro、Vision Pro和14英寸MacBook Pro将获得M5芯片更新。
    *   **M5 MacBook Pro预热：** 苹果营销主管Greg Joswiak曾通过社交媒体预告“强大的产品即将到来”，暗示M5 MacBook Pro的发布。
items.shortSummary: 苹果今日通过新闻稿发布了搭载全新M5芯片的MacBook Pro、Vision Pro和iPad Pro。MacBook Pro升级了M5芯片、更快的SSD和内存带宽；Vision Pro提升了显示效果、刷新率和电池续航；iPad Pro则配备了M5芯片、更快的SSD、Wi-Fi 7和快充。所有M5设备即日起预订，10月22日发售。文章还提及了Apple TV+更名、iOS更新及未来产品的多项传闻。
items.translated_title: 苹果今天发布的所有产品一览
items.content:
We didn't get a second fall event this year, but Apple did unveil updated products with a series of press releases that went out today. The M5 chip made an appearance in new MacBook Pro, Vision Pro, and iPad Pro models.

Subscribe to the MacRumors YouTube channel for more videos.

We've rounded up our coverage and highlighted the main feature changes for each device below.

MacBook Pro



  • M5 chip with 10-core CPU and 10-core GPU

  • Neural Accelerators for GPU

  • 153GB/s memory bandwidth, up from 120GB/s

  • 2x faster SSD

  • Up to 4TB storage

  • Priced starting at $1,599


Vision Pro



  • M5 chip with 10-core CPU and 10-core GPU

  • 10 percent more pixels rendered on micro-OLED displays for sharper images and crisper text

  • Refresh rate up to 120Hz for reduced motion blur

  • Longer 2.5 hour battery life

  • More comfortable Dual Knit Band

  • Priced starting at $3,499

  • Dual Knit Band included with M5 model, or $99 standalone


iPad Pro



  • M5 chip with up to 10-core CPU and 10-core GPU

  • 12GB RAM minimum

  • 2x faster SSD read and write speeds

  • N1 networking chip with Wi-Fi 7 and Bluetooth 6

  • C1X modem with up to 50 percent faster cellular data performance

  • Fast charge support with 50% charge in 35 minutes

  • Priced starting at $999


Our Full Coverage


There are more tidbits on what was announced today available in our coverage of the new devices.

  • Apple Unveils M5 Chip With Next-Generation GPU

  • Apple Announces New 14-Inch MacBook Pro With M5 Chip

  • Apple Updates Vision Pro With M5 Chip, Dual Knit Band, and 120Hz Support

  • Apple Debuts New iPad Pro With M5 Chip, Faster Charging, and More

  • Apple Releases Black Version of Magic Keyboard for iPad Air

  • New MacBook Pro Does Not Include a Charger in the Box in Europe

  • Two New Accessories for Vision Pro Now Available, With More Coming

  • Discontinued M2 Vision Pro Not Available for Trade-In


Launch Date


The new M5 devices are available for pre-order starting today, and will launch on Wednesday, October 22.
This article, "Here's Everything Apple Announced Today" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: 苹果发布 Safari 技术预览版 230，包含错误修复和性能改进 (原标题: Apple Releases Safari Technology Preview 230 With Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## 苹果发布 Safari 技术预览版 230

苹果于2025年10月15日发布了Safari技术预览版（Safari Technology Preview）的最新更新，版本号为230。Safari技术预览版是苹果于2016年3月首次推出的实验性浏览器，旨在让用户能够提前测试未来Safari浏览器版本中计划发布的新功能。

### 主要更新内容

*   **修复与改进**：版本230包含了针对CSS、HTML、MathML、Media、Rendering、SVG、Security、Web API、Web Extension和Web Inspector的错误修复和性能更新。
*   **兼容性**：当前版本的Safari技术预览版兼容运行macOS Sequoia和macOS Tahoe（最新版macOS）的设备。
*   **获取方式**：已从苹果官网下载该浏览器的用户，可通过“系统偏好设置”或“系统设置”中的“软件更新”机制获取此更新。
*   **发布说明**：完整的更新发布说明可在Safari技术预览版网站上查阅。

### 目的与特点

*   **收集反馈**：苹果发布Safari技术预览版的主要目的是收集开发者和用户对其浏览器开发过程的反馈。
*   **并行运行**：该实验性浏览器可以与用户设备上现有的Safari浏览器并行运行，互不影响。
*   **无需开发者账户**：尽管Safari技术预览版主要面向开发者，但下载和使用它并不需要开发者账户。

![Safari Technology Preview Updated Feature 1](https://images.macrumors.com/t/4wGm3KfXnNBIwQ0MGZSmcCu6K0w=/400x0/article-new/2024/07/Safari-Technology-Preview-Updated-Feature-1.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果于2025年10月15日发布了Safari技术预览版230。此实验性浏览器更新旨在让用户测试未来Safari版本的功能，主要包含对CSS、HTML、MathML、Media、Rendering、SVG、Security、Web API、Web Extension和Web Inspector的错误修复和性能改进。它兼容macOS Sequoia和macOS Tahoe，可与现有Safari并行运行，且无需开发者账户即可下载使用，旨在收集用户和开发者的反馈。
items.translated_title: 苹果发布 Safari 技术预览版 230，包含错误修复和性能改进
items.content:
Apple today released a new update for Safari Technology Preview, the experimental browser that was first introduced in March 2016. Apple designed ‌Safari Technology Preview‌ to allow users to test features that are planned for future release versions of the Safari browser.


‌Safari Technology Preview‌ 230 includes fixes and updates for CSS, HTML, MathML, Media, Rendering, SVG, Security, Web API, Web Extension, and Web Inspector.

The current ‌Safari Technology Preview‌ release is compatible with machines running macOS Sequoia and macOS Tahoe, the newest version of macOS.

The ‌Safari Technology Preview‌ update is available through the Software Update mechanism in System Preferences or System Settings to anyone who has downloaded the browser from Apple’s website. Complete release notes for the update are available on the Safari Technology Preview website.

Apple’s aim with ‌Safari Technology Preview‌ is to gather feedback from developers and users on its browser development process. ‌Safari Technology Preview‌ can run side-by-side with the existing Safari browser and while it is designed for developers, it does not require a developer account to download and use.
Tag: Safari Technology Preview

items.title: 艾迪·库伊解释为何Apple TV+更名为Apple TV (原标题: Eddy Cue Explains Why Apple TV+ is Now Apple TV)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
## 艾迪·库伊解释Apple TV+更名为Apple TV的原因

在最新一期的《The Town》播客中，苹果服务主管艾迪·库伊（Eddy Cue）阐述了公司决定将流媒体服务Apple TV+更名为Apple TV的原因。

### 更名的主要原因

*   **用户习惯：** 库伊表示，许多人早已习惯将Apple TV+称为“Apple TV”，因此公司最终决定采纳这个更简洁的名称。
*   **时机成熟：** 他向主持人马修·贝洛尼（Matthew Belloni）透露：“我们就是决定了。我们都叫它Apple TV，我们认为，鉴于我们目前的状况，现在是时候这样做了。”

### 服务背景与潜在混淆

*   **服务发展：** Apple TV+于2019年11月1日推出，现已发展成熟，并拥有不断增长的屡获殊荣的剧集库。
*   **潜在混淆：** 新名称可能会引起一些混淆，因为现在有：
    *   Apple TV 流媒体服务（新名称）
    *   Apple TV 应用
    *   Apple TV 硬件

### 艾迪·库伊的回应

针对可能出现的混淆，库伊解释道：

*   **硬件名称：** 苹果的硬件设备现在被称为“Apple TV 4K”。他认为“这很好”。
*   **应用名称：** 应用仍然叫做“Apple TV”，并且在第三方产品上也一直如此。他相信这不会造成任何问题。

### 实施情况

尽管更名已经宣布，但新名称尚未在大多数地方显示，预计很快就会全面切换。库伊的这些评论最初由9to5Mac的扎克·霍尔（Zac Hall）报道。

![Apple TV Color](https://images.macrumors.com/t/87iIRlbmJunxUuqt2w1EGIHXX6c=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/Apple-TV-Color.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果服务主管艾迪·库伊解释了Apple TV+更名为Apple TV的原因。他指出，许多用户已习惯称其为“Apple TV”，公司决定采纳这个更简洁的名称。为避免与硬件和应用混淆，库伊澄清硬件现在叫“Apple TV 4K”，应用仍是“Apple TV”，他认为这不会造成问题。新名称预计将很快全面启用。
items.translated_title: 艾迪·库伊解释为何Apple TV+更名为Apple TV
items.content:
On the latest episode of The Town podcast, Apple's services chief Eddy Cue explained why the company decided to rename Apple TV+ to Apple TV.


According to Cue, many people already referred to Apple TV+ as Apple TV, so the company finally decided to embrace the simpler name.

"We just decided," he told host Matthew Belloni.

"We all called it Apple TV and we said, given where we are today, it's a great time to do it," added Cue. Launched on November 1, 2019, Apple's streaming service is now well established, and it offers a growing library of award-winning series.

Nonetheless, the new name may cause confusion, as there is now an Apple TV streaming service, an Apple TV app, and Apple TV hardware.

Cue argued that the Apple TV box is actually named the Apple TV 4K nowadays.

"Our hardware is called Apple TV 4K for your TV," he said. "I think that's fine, and the app is called Apple TV. It's been called Apple TV on our third-party products as well, so I don't think that'll be a problem at all."

The new name has yet to appear in most places, but the changeover should happen soon.

Cue's comments were first reported by 9to5Mac's Zac Hall.

Tags: Apple TV Plus, Eddy Cue

This article, "Eddy Cue Explains Why Apple TV+ is Now Apple TV" first appeared on MacRumors.com

items.title: 苹果解释如何修复iOS 26中iMessage未送达提示 (原标题: Apple Explains How to Fix iMessage Not Delivered Alert in iOS 26)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iOS 26中iMessage未送达提示的修复方法

苹果公司最近更新了其iMessage故障排除支持文档，以解决在iOS 26中可能出现的一个特定问题。

## 问题描述
当用户在安装iOS 26的新iPhone上进行设置时，如果未能激活iMessage或eSIM，可能会导致iMessage无法正常工作。具体来说，如果在初始iPhone设置期之后，用户在“设置”应用中手动激活eSIM，iMessage不会自动激活。

## 症状
如果iMessage在激活eSIM后未能正确激活，用户可能会遇到以下情况：
*   收到“未送达”提示。
*   信息以SMS/RCS消息形式发送，显示为绿色气泡。
*   iMessage信息通过电子邮件地址而非电话号码发送。

## 解决方案
苹果提供了简单的手动修复步骤：
1.  激活eSIM后。
2.  打开“设置”应用。
3.  点击“应用”。
4.  选择“信息”。
5.  关闭iMessage，然后再重新打开，以使该功能正常运行。

![iOS 26 Messages Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/1XAQeERAXrrbuh0764aXvhsLyvY=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/iOS-26-Messages-Feature-2-1.jpg?lossy)

## 其他热门新闻

文章中还提到了其他一些热门新闻和传闻：

*   **苹果新品发布预期**：据彭博社的马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）透露，苹果预计本周将发布2到3款新产品，可能包括iPad Pro、Vision Pro以及基础款14英寸MacBook Pro，它们都可能获得M5芯片的规格升级。
*   **Apple TV+更名为Apple TV**：苹果宣布其流媒体服务Apple TV+将更名为“Apple TV”，并采用全新的视觉标识。
*   **新款14英寸MacBook Pro发布**：苹果发布了搭载M5芯片的14英寸MacBook Pro基础款，存储选项最高可达4TB（此前为2TB），但统一内存仍为32GB。
*   **iOS 26.0.2更新准备中**：苹果正在内部测试iOS 26.0.2更新，预计将是一个修复错误和/或安全漏洞的小版本更新，并可能在未来几周内发布。
*   **新款iPad Pro发布**：苹果发布了下一代iPad Pro，搭载定制的M5、C1X和N1芯片，M5芯片拥有10核CPU和下一代GPU，AI性能比前代提升3.5倍。
*   **M5 MacBook Pro预告**：苹果营销主管格雷格·乔斯维亚克（Greg Joswiak）通过社交媒体预告了即将推出的产品，暗示“强大的东西即将到来”，并展示了MacBook Pro的剪影。
*   **AirPods Max 2传闻**：据分析师郭明錤称，第二代AirPods Max将比现有版本更轻。
*   **iPhone 18 Pro功能传闻**：尽管距离发布还有近一年，但已有传闻称iPhone 18 Pro系列将配备更小的灵动岛。
*   **苹果正在开发新AirPods产品**：据马克·古尔曼透露，苹果在发布AirPods Pro 3后，正在开发下一代AirPods Pro（可能是AirPods Pro 4或更新版AirPods Pro 3）、AirPods 5和H3芯片。
*   **M5 MacBook Pro即将推出**：预计将是首批搭载下一代M5芯片的设备之一，M5芯片采用台积电更先进的3纳米工艺，将带来速度和效率的提升。

items.translated_title: 苹果解释如何修复iOS 26中iMessage未送达提示
items.content:
Apple today updated its iMessage troubleshooting support document to add a scenario that can occur in iOS 26. If you don't activate iMessage or an eSIM when setting up a new iPhone with ‌iOS 26‌, it can prevent iMessage from working.


Apple says that iMessage does not activate automatically when setting up an eSIM in the Settings app after the initial ‌iPhone‌ setup period, so it needs to be done manually.

After activating an eSIM, users can open up the Settings app, tap on Apps, choose Messages, and then turn iMessage off and back on to get the feature to work as intended.

When iMessage is not properly activated after setting up an eSIM, users can receive a Not Delivered alert, have their messages sent as SMS/RCS messages in green bubbles, or see their iMessages delivered from an email address instead of a phone number.

items.title: 史蒂夫·乔布斯将于2026年登上美国1美元纪念币 (原标题: Steve Jobs to Be Featured on U.S. Commemorative $1 Coin in 2026)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
美国铸币局宣布，将于2026年发行一枚以史蒂夫·乔布斯为主题的1美元美国创新纪念币，其设计已于2025年10月15日公布。

### 纪念币设计亮点

*   **人物形象**：纪念币正面描绘了年轻的史蒂夫·乔布斯，身穿高领毛衣、牛仔裤和运动鞋，坐在一片典型的北加州橡树覆盖的连绵山丘前。
*   **姿态与神情**：乔布斯沉思的姿态和表情，旨在展现他如何从自然环境中汲取灵感，将复杂的技术转化为像自然本身一样直观和有机的产品。
*   **铭文**：
    *   “UNITED STATES OF AMERICA”（美利坚合众国）
    *   “CALIFORNIA”（加利福尼亚）
    *   “STEVE JOBS”（史蒂夫·乔布斯）
    *   “MAKE SOMETHING WONDERFUL”（创造非凡）

![史蒂夫·乔布斯纪念币](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Comfjbjt7lsoRxSGgWJ7v_4dFeo=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/steve-jobs-coin.jpg?lossy)

### 发行背景与购买信息

*   **发行系列**：这枚纪念币是美国创新纪念币系列的一部分，该系列始于2018年，旨在纪念每个州的美国创新或开创性努力。
*   **提名**：加利福尼亚州州长加文·纽森（Gavin Newsom）早些时候提名了苹果联合创始人史蒂夫·乔布斯，认为他勇于尝试新想法、突破可能界限的精神，完美体现了加州的创新精神。
*   **购买方式**：
    *   纪念币将于2026年通过美国铸币局官方网站发售。
    *   单枚收藏币售价为13.25美元。
    *   包含三位其他创新者/创新的四枚一套纪念币售价为27.50美元。
    *   另有25枚一卷和100枚一袋的包装可供选择。
items.shortSummary: 美国铸币局宣布将于2026年发行一枚史蒂夫·乔布斯主题的1美元美国创新纪念币。该币是美国创新纪念币系列的一部分，由加州州长提名，旨在纪念乔布斯突破界限的创新精神。纪念币设计展现了年轻的乔布斯在北加州风景前沉思，并刻有“创造非凡”等铭文。该纪念币将于2026年通过美国铸币局网站发售，提供单枚或套装购买。
items.translated_title: 史蒂夫·乔布斯将于2026年登上美国1美元纪念币
items.content:
The United States Mint will soon begin producing a new $1 American Innovation Coin featuring Steve Jobs, and the design for the coin was previewed today.


The $1 Steve Jobs Coin features a young Steve Jobs in a turtleneck, jeans, and sneakers. The coin is inscribed with the words "make something wonderful." A full description is available on the U.S. Mint website:
This design presents a young Steve Jobs sitting in front of a quintessentially northern California landscape of oak-covered rolling hills. His posture and expression, as he is captured in a moment of reflection, show how this environment inspired his vision to transform complex technology into something as intuitive and organic as nature itself. Inscriptions are "UNITED STATES OF AMERICA" and "CALIFORNIA." Additional inscriptions are "STEVE JOBS" and "MAKE SOMETHING WONDERFUL."

When it launches in 2026, the Steve Jobs coin will be purchasable from the U.S. Mint website. The collectible coins will be available for $13.25, or in a set of four (including three featuring other innovators/innovations) for $27.50. Rolls of 25 coins and bags of 100 coins are also available.

The Steve Jobs coin is part of a multi-year series that started in 2018. Each state is able to nominate an American innovation or pioneering effort for memorialization in a collectible coin.

California Governor Gavin Newsom recommended Apple co-founder Steve Jobs for the coin earlier this year. Newsom said that Jobs' willingness to try new ideas and push the boundaries of what's possible embodied the California spirit.
